wonderful bizarre and shockingly profound world of goo manages to provide an incredibly satisfying physicspuzzle experience and a strange demented and beautiful storyline at the same time all through crudely drawn stick figures and little balls of goo for such a deceptively simple concept the amount of artfulness and narrative intrigue in this title is astounding
